short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust the blackout area and transparency using sliders and radio buttons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is useful in the following situations:
During presentations in browser-based web conferences, such as on Google Meet, it allows you to overlay the screens of other participants. This can help reduce the anxiety of being watched by others.
In browser-based web meetings, when sharing your screen, it enables you to cover parts of your screen that you do not want to show to others.

GoogleMeetなどのブラウザベースのWeb会議で発表する際にほかの人の画面を覆うことで、他の人に見られているという緊張を和らげることができます。
ブラウザベースのWeb会議で画面共有をする際に相手に見せたくない部分を覆うことができます。
